00076   SignalGroup* Link::getSignalGroup(int scatsId){
00077     for(SignalGroupSet::iterator sgi=signal_groups.begin(); sgi != signal_groups.end(); sgi++){
00078       if( (*sgi)->getScatsId() == scatsId ) return *sgi;
00079     }
00080     return NULL;
00081   }
